tool_description: Identifies outdated content by analyzing modification dates, usage patterns, user feedback, and content relevance indicators to flag content requiring updates.

content_metadata.description: Content metadata including dates and attributes

usage_patterns.description: Usage patterns showing content engagement over time

staleness_threshold_days.description: Days since last update to consider content stale

usage_decline_threshold.description: Percentage decline in usage indicating obsolescence

error_messages: Empty metadata: content_metadata cannot be empty
Missing usage patterns: usage_patterns array must contain valid data
Invalid staleness threshold: staleness_threshold_days must be between 30 and 1825
Invalid decline threshold: usage_decline_threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0
usage: Input content_metadata and usage_patterns from previous analyses. Set staleness_threshold_days and usage_decline_threshold to control detection sensitivity.

outdated_content_ids.description: IDs of content identified as outdated

update_priority_scores.description: Priority scores for updating each outdated item

obsolescence_reasons.description: Reasons why content was flagged as outdated

total_outdated_count.description: Total number of outdated content items
